Detailed Description

Performs digitization of simulated HCal data.

00045         int numHCalSimHits = hcalHits->GetEntries();

00048             //int detID=simHit->getID();

00052             detID_->setRawValue(detIDraw);
00053             detID_->unpack();
00054             int layer = detID_->getFieldValue("layer");
00055             if (verbose_)
00056                 std::cout << "layer: " << layer << std::endl;
00057             if (hcalLayerEdep.find(simHit->getID()) == hcalLayerEdep.end()) {
00058                 // first hit, initialize
00059                 hcalLayerEdep[detIDraw] = simHit->getEdep();
00060                 hcalLayerTime[detIDraw] = simHit->getTime() * simHit->getEdep();
00061                 hcalDetId[detIDraw] = detIDraw;
00062                 hcalZpos[detIDraw] = simHit->getPosition()[2];
00063                 hcalLayerNum[detIDraw] = layer;
00064             } else {
00065                 // not first hit, aggregate
00066                 hcalLayerEdep[detIDraw] += simHit->getEdep();
00067                 hcalLayerTime[detIDraw] += simHit->getTime() * simHit->getEdep();
00068             }
00069         } // end loop over sim hits
00070 
00071         // loop over detID (layers) and simulate number of PEs
00072         int ihit = 0;
00073         for (std::map<int, float>::iterator it = hcalLayerEdep.begin(); it != hcalLayerEdep.end(); ++it) {
00074             int detIDraw = it->first;
00075             double depEnergy = hcalLayerEdep[detIDraw];
00076             hcalLayerTime[detIDraw] = hcalLayerTime[detIDraw] / hcalLayerEdep[detIDraw];
00077             double meanPE = depEnergy / MEV_PER_MIP * PE_PER_MIP;
00078 
00079             //        std::default_random_engine generator;
00080             //std::poisson_distribution<int> distribution(meanPE);
00081 
00082             hcalLayerPEs[detIDraw] = random_->Poisson(meanPE);
00083             hcalLayerPEs[detIDraw] += random_->Gaus(meanNoise_);
00084 
00085             if (verbose_) {
00086                 std::cout << "detID: " << detIDraw << std::endl;
00087                 std::cout << "Layer: " << hcalLayerNum[detIDraw] << std::endl;

00089                 std::cout << "numPEs: " << hcalLayerPEs[detIDraw] << std::endl;
00090                 std::cout << "time: " << hcalLayerTime[detIDraw] << std::endl;
00091                 std::cout << "z: " << hcalZpos[detIDraw] << std::endl;
00092             }        // end verbose
00093 
00094             int layer = hcalLayerNum[detIDraw];
00095             double energy = hcalLayerPEs[detIDraw] / PE_PER_MIP * MEV_PER_MIP; // need to add in a weighting factor eventually
00096

00098 
00099             //  hit->setLayer(layer);

00101             hit->setAmplitude(hcalLayerPEs[detIDraw]);

00105             //  hit->setZpos(hcalZpos[detIDraw]);
